00055 /* Create hash table, initialise ptrs to NULL
00056  * @param countOrder Description of the param.
00057  * @return void
00058  */
00059 void HashTable::inithashtable(bool countOrder) {
00060     int i;
00061     TSIZE = INITIAL_SIZE;
00062     numNodes = 0;
00063     countOriginalOrder = countOrder;
00064     hash = (HASHREC **) malloc(sizeof(HASHREC *) * TSIZE);
00065 
00066     for (i = 0; i < TSIZE; i++)
00067         hash[i] = (HASHREC *) NULL;
00068 }
00069 
00070 /* Create hash table with a given size, initialise ptrs to NULL
00071  * @param size Description of the param.
00072  * @param countOrder Description of the param.
00073  * @return void
00074  */
00075 void HashTable::inithashtable(unsigned int size, bool countOrder) {
00076     int i;
00077     TSIZE = size;
00078     numNodes = 0;
00079     countOriginalOrder = countOrder;
00080     hash = (HASHREC **) malloc(sizeof(HASHREC *) * TSIZE);
00081 
00082     for (i = 0; i < TSIZE; i++)
00083         hash[i] = (HASHREC *) NULL;
00084 }

00090 void HashTable::delete_key(char *w) {
00091     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00092     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00093 
00094     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00095     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00096         ;
00097     }
00098 
00099     if (hprv == NULL)
00100         hash[hval] = htmp->next;
00101     else
00102         hprv->next = htmp->next;
00103 
00104     free(htmp->word);
00105     numNodes--;
00106     //    free(htmp);
00107     htmp = NULL;
00108 }

00110 /* Search hash table for given string, return record if found, else NULL
00111  * @param w Description of the param.
00112  * @return The expected result
00113  */
00114 HASHREC *
00115 HashTable::hashsearch(char *w) {
00116     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00117     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00118 
00119     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00120     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00121         ;
00122     }
00123 
00124     if (hprv != NULL && htmp != NULL) /* move to front on access */
00125     {
00126         hprv->next = htmp->next;
00127         htmp->next = hash[hval];
00128         hash[hval] = htmp;
00129     }
00130 
00131     return (htmp);
00132 }

00134 /* Search hash table for given rec to get another equivalent, return record if found, else NULL
00135  * @param rec Description of the param.
00136  * @return The expected result
00137  */
00138 HASHREC *
00139 HashTable::hashsearch(HASHREC *rec) {
00140     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00141 
00142     char *w;
00143 
00144     if (rec->prefix == NULL) {
00145         w = rec->word;
00146     } else { //concat prefix and suffix in w
00147         w = (char *) malloc(strlen(rec->prefix->word) + strlen(rec->word) + 1);
00148         strcpy(w, rec->prefix->word);
00149         strcat(w, rec->word);
00150     }
00151 
00152     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00153 
00154     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00155     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00156         ;
00157     }
00158 
00159     if (hprv != NULL && htmp != NULL) /* move to front on access */
00160     {
00161         hprv->next = htmp->next;
00162         htmp->next = hash[hval];
00163         hash[hval] = htmp;
00164     }
00165 
00166     if (rec->prefix != NULL) {
00167         free(w);
00168     }
00169 
00170     return (htmp);
00171 }

00173 /* Search hash table for given string, insert if not found, update information if found
00174  * @param shared Description of the param.
00175  * @param globalId Description of the param.
00176  * @return The expected result
00177  */
00178 HASHREC*
00179 HashTable::hashinsert(HASHREC* shared, unsigned int &globalId) {
00180     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00181     char *w;
00182 
00183     if (shared->prefix == NULL) {
00184         w = shared->word;
00185     } else { //concat prefix and suffix in w
00186         w = (char *) malloc(strlen(shared->prefix->word) + strlen(shared->word)
00187                 + 1);
00188         strcpy(w, shared->prefix->word);
00189         strcat(w, shared->word);
00190     }
00191     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00192 
00193     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00194     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00195         ;
00196     }
00197 
00198     if (htmp == NULL) {
00199 
00200         htmp = (HASHREC *) malloc(sizeof(HASHREC));
00201 
00202         htmp->shared = true;
00203 
00204         if (shared->prefix == NULL) {
00205             htmp->word = w; //get the same reference
00206             htmp->prefix = NULL;
00207         } else {
00208             htmp->word = shared->word;
00209             htmp->prefix = shared->prefix;
00210         }
00211 
00212         if (countOriginalOrder == false)
00213             htmp->id = 0; //initialize to 0, asigned after the final sort
00214         else {
00215             htmp->id = globalId;
00216             globalId++;
00217         }
00218         htmp->new_id = 0;
00219         htmp->count = 1;
00220         numNodes++;
00221         htmp->next = NULL;
00222 
00223         if (hprv == NULL)
00224             hash[hval] = htmp;
00225         else
00226             hprv->next = htmp;
00227 
00228         /* new records are not moved to front */
00229     } else {
00230         htmp->count = htmp->count + 1;
00231         htmp->shared = true;
00232         if (hprv != NULL) /* move to front on access */
00233         {
00234             hprv->next = htmp->next;
00235             htmp->next = hash[hval];
00236             hash[hval] = htmp;
00237         }
00238 
00239     }
00240 
00241     if (shared->prefix != NULL)
00242         free(w);
00243 
00244     return htmp;
00245 }

00247 /* Search hash table for given string, insert if not found, update information if found
00248  * Insert not shared, prefix or not.
00249  * @param w Description of the param.
00250  * @param globalId Description of the param.
00251  * @param prefix Description of the param.
00252  * @return The expected result
00253  */
00254 HASHREC*
00255 HashTable::hashinsert(char *w, unsigned int &globalId, MINIHASHREC* prefix) {
00256     HASHREC *htmp, *hprv;
00257     unsigned int hval = HASHFN(w, TSIZE, SEED);
00258 
00259     for (hprv = NULL, htmp = hash[hval]
00260     ; htmp != NULL && scmp(htmp, w) != 0; hprv = htmp, htmp = htmp->next) {
00261         ;
00262     }
00263 
00264     if (htmp == NULL) {
00265 
00266         htmp = (HASHREC *) malloc(sizeof(HASHREC));
00267 
00268         htmp->shared = false;
00269 
00270         if (prefix != NULL) {
00271             htmp->prefix = prefix;
00272             htmp->word = (char *) malloc(strlen(w) - strlen(prefix->word) + 1);
00273             strcpy(htmp->word, w + strlen(prefix->word)); //copy the suffix value
00274 
00275         } else {
00276             htmp->prefix = NULL;
00277             htmp->word = (char *) malloc(strlen(w) + 1);
00278             strcpy(htmp->word, w); //copy the value
00279         }
00280 
00281         if (countOriginalOrder == false)
00282             htmp->id = 0; //initialize to 0, asigned after the final sort
00283         else {
00284             htmp->id = globalId;
00285             globalId++;
00286         }
00287         htmp->new_id = 0;
00288         htmp->count = 1;
00289         numNodes++;
00290         htmp->next = NULL;
00291 
00292         if (hprv == NULL)
00293             hash[hval] = htmp;
00294         else
00295             hprv->next = htmp;
00296 
00297         /* new records are not moved to front */
00298     } else {
00299 
00300         htmp->count = htmp->count + 1;
00301         htmp->shared = false;
00302         if (hprv != NULL) /* move to front on access */
00303         {
00304             hprv->next = htmp->next;
00305             htmp->next = hash[hval];
00306             hash[hval] = htmp;
00307         }
00308 
00309     }
00310 
00311     return htmp;
00312 }

00317 void HashTable::dump() {
00318     int i;
00319     HASHREC *ptr;
00320 
00321     for (i = 0; i < TSIZE; i++) {
00322         for (ptr = hash[i]; ptr != NULL; ptr = ptr->next) {
00323             // ptr stores current element in the iteration
00324 
00325         }
00326     }
00327 }

00329 /* Bitwise hash function.  Note that tsize does not have to be prime.
00330  * @param word Description of the param.
00331  * @param tsize Description of the param.
00332  * @param seed Description of the param.
00333  * @return The expected result
00334  */
00335 unsigned int HashTable::bitwisehash(char *word, unsigned int tsize,
00336         unsigned int seed) {
00337     char c;
00338     unsigned int h;
00339 
00340     h = seed;
00341     for (; (c = *word) != '\0'; word++) {
00342         h ^= ((h << 5) + c + (h >> 2));
00343     }
00344     return ((unsigned int) ((h & 0x7fffffff) % tsize));
00345 }
00346 
00347 /* SCMP
00348  * @param htmp Description of the param.
00349  * @param s2 Description of the param.
00350  * @return The expected result
00351  */
00352 int HashTable::scmp(HASHREC* htmp, char *s2) {
00353     char* it;
00354 
00355     if (htmp->prefix == NULL) {
00356 
00357         it = htmp->word;
00358 
00359         while (*it != '\0' && *it == *s2) {
00360             it++;
00361             s2++;
00362         }
00363         return (*it - *s2);
00364     }
00365 
00366     else {
00367         it = htmp->prefix->word;
00368 
00369         // compare with prefix and suffix. 
00370         while (it != '\0' && *it == *s2) {
00371             it++;
00372             s2++;
00373         }
00374         if (*it != '\0') {
00375             //not match
00376             return (*it - *s2);
00377         } else {
00378             //match prefix, test suffix (from the last pointer of s2)
00379 
00380 
00381             it = htmp->word;
00382             while (*it != '\0' && *it == *s2) {
00383                 it++;
00384                 s2++;
00385             }
00386 
00387             return (*it - *s2);
00388 
00389         }
00390     }
00391 }

00394 HashTable::~HashTable() {
00395     for (int i = 0; i < TSIZE; i++) {
00396         HASHREC* ptr;
00397         while (hash[i] != NULL) {
00398             ptr = hash[i]->next;
00399             // MIRARLO EN ALGÃšN MOMENTO!!!
00400             //  if (hash[i]->word != NULL)
00401             //      free(hash[i]->word);
00402 
00403             free( hash[i]);
00404             hash[i] = ptr;
00405         }
00406     }
00407 
00408     free( hash);
00409 }
